name: ADRD Cognitive Symptoms
content: Cognitive symptom terminology: Memory loss, Memory impairment, Forgetfulness, Short-term memory loss, Long-term memory loss, Recent memory loss, Remote memory loss, Amnesia, Disorientation, Confused, Confusion, Word-finding difficulty, Anomia, Aphasia, Language impairment, Getting lost, Visuospatial deficit, Executive dysfunction, Poor judgment, Impaired reasoning, Abstract thinking deficit, Apraxia, Agnosia, Difficulty concentrating, Attention deficit, Mental slowing, Bradyphrenia
